name: JustMy.scss
author: Kyle Brumm <kjbrumm@gmail.com> (http://kylebrumm.com)
description: Another stupid SCSS framework, but it's just mine.

scripts.css:autoprefix: postcss --use autoprefixer --output dist/justmy.css dist/justmy.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --output dist/justmy.min.css dist/justmy.min.css
scripts.css:build: npm run css:compile && npm run css:autoprefix
scripts.css:compile: node-sass justmy/justmy.scss dist/justmy.css && node-sass --output-style compressed justmy/justmy.scss dist/justmy.min.css
